entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
